item.title: 【认证】领英热门职位免费学习路径
item.description: ## [LinkedIn 热门职位免费学习路径](https://opportunity.linkedin.com/zh-cn/skills-for-in-demand-jobs?lr=1) ### 生成式 AI - [获得 “生成式 AI 提升工作效率 ”专业证书](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/27534108-d08b-3576-9208-59c8487e6bfa?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) - [获得“组织领导者的人工智能基础知识”专业证书](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/1c73bf8b-1a31-33ee-afed-3eb01bb927df?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) - [获得“使用 Microsoft Copilot 提高工作效率”专业证书](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/85ba43ae-62ad-3739-ad0b-e02117754625?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) - [面向管理者的人工智能基础知识（微软与领英联合制作）](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/35c97a5d-11af-39e3-9374-7f9474d0ea69?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) - [获得“组织领导者的人工智能基础知识”专业证书](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/1c73bf8b-1a31-33ee-afed-3eb01bb927df?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) - [面向管理者的人工智能基础知识（微软与领英联合制作）](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/35c97a5d-11af-39e3-9374-7f9474d0ea69?src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other) ### 探索热门职位，以及您获得成功需要的技能 - [获得软件开发专业证书的职业基础知识](https://www.linkedin.com/learning/paths/82c5f802-5215-36d2-a105-fda88d624d65?u=104&src=re-other&veh=learn.microsoft.com%7Cre-other)。
